document_data.name: City Guard of Medina al-Afyal
document_data.orgname: the City Guard of Medina al-Afyal
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Medina al-Afyal]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of the Elephant".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 2,000 infantry, 500 regular cavalry, 500 [[elephant]] cavalry, and four 300-man units of [[mamluk]]s from the [[Wondrous Mamluk Society]].
document_data.Activities: The mamluks of the Wondrous served as the palace guard.
